about.message: Cat Simulator aims to be a hyper realistic cat simulation.  It is an open source project [https://github.com/snollygolly/cat-simulator-bot] and pull requests are welcome!

greeting: You see a pair of glowing eyes in the darkness

pet.message: The kitty rubs up against [PLAYER]'s leg
The kitty purrs loudly and rubs against [PLAYER]'s leg

play.message: The kitty jumps up and adorably murders the toy
The kitty jumps up and adorably murders your hand
The kitty bats at the toy lazily and falls over to groom
The kitty takes the toy in its mouth and runs away from [PLAYER]

shoo.message: The kitty hisses as [PLAYER] and runs off
The kitty just sits there and stares at [PLAYER]
The kitty trots off without even looking at [PLAYER]
The kitty glares at [PLAYER] and hisses

pickup.message: The kitty relaxes in [PLAYER]'s arms and purrs
The kitty freaks out and scratches [PLAYER]
The kitty tolerates it for a little bit and then hops down
The kitty climbs up [PLAYER]'s back to get away'

cuddle.message: The kitty decides [PLAYER]'s nose was food
The kitty purrs and then puts its butt in [PLAYER]'s face
The kitty stares right at [PLAYER] and blinks slowly

stare.message: The kitty lays down and goes to sleep
The kitty doesn't seem to pay any attention to [PLAYER]
